description.p: This is my first post on this blog hosted at awesome github pages. Previously I used to blog on wordpress here but I switched to github pages because I really wanted to have static blog with free hosting and ability to write up quick posts using Markdown syntax. In the next post, I will write about BloggerCMS, a CMS I have made that helps create static blogs. This blog has also been generated via BloggerCMS :)
On this blog, I intend to write my ideas mainly about PHP as well as other related web development technologies.
